oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Weed management with different mulches under organic strawberry production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kivijärvi, Pirjo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Weed control efficacy of organic mulch materials is limited and is not as effective as the conventional plastic. Weed control efficiency also varies depending on the weed species.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kivijärvi, Pirjo (2006) Weed management with different mulches under organic strawberry production. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 2 (10), p. 35.
